mapper.select:
select platformServiceFee.Id platformServiceFee_id, platformServiceFee.PlatformId platformServiceFee_platformId, platformServiceFee.SpvId platformServiceFee_spvId, platformServiceFee.ProductId platformServiceFee_productId, platformServiceFee.ReturnMoneyId platformServiceFee_returnMoneyId, platformServiceFee.SpvLoanId platformServiceFee_spvLoanId, platformServiceFee.TradeNumber platformServiceFee_tradeNumber, platformServiceFee.PayPlantformNumber platformServiceFee_payPlantformNumber, platformServiceFee.PrincipalAmount platformServiceFee_principalAmount, platformServiceFee.ServiceFee platformServiceFee_serviceFee, platformServiceFee.ServiceFeeRatio platformServiceFee_serviceFeeRatio, platformServiceFee.TakeTime platformServiceFee_takeTime, platformServiceFee.TakeStatus platformServiceFee_takeStatus, platformServiceFee.TakeFinishTime platformServiceFee_takeFinishTime, platformServiceFee.CheckingTime platformServiceFee_checkingTime, platformServiceFee.CheckingStatus platformServiceFee_checkingStatus, platformServiceFee.Remark platformServiceFee_remark, productReturnMoney.Id productReturnMoney_id, productReturnMoney.MemberId productReturnMoney_memberId, productReturnMoney.SpvId productReturnMoney_spvId, productReturnMoney.ProductId productReturnMoney_productId, productReturnMoney.SubscriptionId productReturnMoney_subscriptionId, productReturnMoney.TransactionNumber productReturnMoney_transactionNumber, productReturnMoney.SpvIntoObjectId productReturnMoney_spvIntoObjectId, productReturnMoney.ObjectIncomeNumber productReturnMoney_objectIncomeNumber, productReturnMoney.ReturnNumber productReturnMoney_returnNumber, productReturnMoney.PayPlantformNumber productReturnMoney_payPlantformNumber, productReturnMoney.ProductName productReturnMoney_productName, productReturnMoney.ProductCode productReturnMoney_productCode, productReturnMoney.DistributePrincipal productReturnMoney_distributePrincipal, productReturnMoney.DistributeInterest productReturnMoney_distributeInterest, productReturnMoney.DistributeAmount productReturnMoney_distributeAmount, productReturnMoney.DistributeStatus productReturnMoney_distributeStatus, productReturnMoney.DistributeTime productReturnMoney_distributeTime, productReturnMoney.InterestRateDate productReturnMoney_interestRateDate, productReturnMoney.PaymentDate productReturnMoney_paymentDate, productReturnMoney.ActualExpirationDate productReturnMoney_actualExpirationDate, productReturnMoney.ExpectedProfitRatio productReturnMoney_expectedProfitRatio, productReturnMoney.ExpectedProfit productReturnMoney_expectedProfit, productReturnMoney.ActualProfitRatio productReturnMoney_actualProfitRatio, productReturnMoney.ActualReturnAmount productReturnMoney_actualReturnAmount, productReturnMoney.MemberServiceFee productReturnMoney_memberServiceFee, productReturnMoney.MemberServiceFeeRatio productReturnMoney_memberServiceFeeRatio, productReturnMoney.ReturnTime productReturnMoney_returnTime, productReturnMoney.ReturnStatus productReturnMoney_returnStatus, productReturnMoney.BusinessCheckStatus productReturnMoney_businessCheckStatus, productReturnMoney.CheckingTime productReturnMoney_checkingTime, productReturnMoney.CheckingStatus productReturnMoney_checkingStatus, productReturnMoney.ObjectIncomeStatus productReturnMoney_objectIncomeStatus, productReturnMoney.ObjectIncomeTime productReturnMoney_objectIncomeTime, productReturnMoney.Remark productReturnMoney_remark, loan.Id loan_id, loan.SpvId loan_spvId, loan.ProductId loan_productId, loan.TradeNumber loan_tradeNumber, loan.PayPlantformNumber loan_payPlantformNumber, loan.ProductName loan_productName, loan.ProductCode loan_productCode, loan.TotalLoanAmount loan_totalLoanAmount, loan.SpvServiceFee loan_spvServiceFee, loan.SpvServiceFeeRatio loan_spvServiceFeeRatio, loan.LoanTime loan_loanTime, loan.LoanStatus loan_loanStatus, loan.CheckingTime loan_checkingTime, loan.CheckingStatus loan_checkingStatus, loan.Remark loan_remark, product.Id product_id, product.BasicProductId product_basicProductId, product.SpvId product_spvId, product.CategoryId product_categoryId, product.AssetCategoryCode product_assetCategoryCode, product.Name product_name, product.Code product_code, product.TotalAmount product_totalAmount, product.SurplusAmount product_surplusAmount, product.FirstPublishTime product_firstPublishTime, product.UmpayAccountNo product_umpayAccountNo, product.Description product_description, product.Status product_status, product.DistributeStatus product_distributeStatus, product.CreatorId product_creatorId, product.CreateTime product_createTime, product.ModifierId product_modifierId, product.ModifyTime product_modifyTime, product.IsDelete product_isDelete, product.Sort product_sort, product.ViewName product_viewName, spvCorporation.Id spvCorporation_id, spvCorporation.Type spvCorporation_type, spvCorporation.Code spvCorporation_code, spvCorporation.UmpayAccountNo spvCorporation_umpayAccountNo, spvCorporation.AvailableAmount spvCorporation_availableAmount, spvCorporation.FrozenAmount spvCorporation_frozenAmount, spvCorporation.UmpayMerchantNo spvCorporation_umpayMerchantNo, spvCorporation.Name spvCorporation_name, spvCorporation.ShortName spvCorporation_shortName, spvCorporation.BankName spvCorporation_bankName, spvCorporation.BankCode spvCorporation_bankCode, spvCorporation.BankCardNumber spvCorporation_bankCardNumber, spvCorporation.SignaturePicPath spvCorporation_signaturePicPath, spvCorporation.Phone spvCorporation_phone, spvCorporation.Fax spvCorporation_fax, spvCorporation.PostCode spvCorporation_postCode, spvCorporation.Address spvCorporation_address, spvCorporation.Description spvCorporation_description, spvCorporation.Status spvCorporation_status, spvCorporation.CreateTime spvCorporation_createTime, spvCorporation.ModifyTime spvCorporation_modifyTime from TC_PlatformServiceFee platformServiceFee inner join TC_ProductReturnMoney productReturnMoney on productReturnMoney.Id=platformServiceFee.ReturnMoneyId inner join TC_Loan loan on loan.Id=platformServiceFee.SpvLoanId inner join PC_Product product on product.Id=platformServiceFee.ProductId inner join CC_SpvCorporation spvCorporation on spvCorporation.Id=platformServiceFee.SpvId
and Id=${id} and PlatformId=${platformId} and SpvId=${spvId} and ProductId=${productId} and ReturnMoneyId=${returnMoneyId} and SpvLoanId=${spvLoanId} and TradeNumber=#{tradeNumber} and PayPlantformNumber=#{payPlantformNumber} and PrincipalAmount=${principalAmount} and ServiceFee=${serviceFee} and ServiceFeeRatio=${serviceFeeRatio} and TakeTime=#{takeTime} and TakeStatus=${takeStatus} and TakeFinishTime=#{takeFinishTime} and CheckingTime=#{checkingTime} and CheckingStatus=${checkingStatus} and Remark=#{remark}

productReturnMoney.MemberServiceFee spvCorporation_memberServiceFee, productReturnMoney.MemberServiceFeeRatio spvCorporation_memberServiceFeeRatio, productReturnMoney.ReturnTime spvCorporation_checkingTime, productReturnMoney.CheckingStatus spvCorporation_checkingStatus, productReturnMoney.ObjectIncomeStatus spvCorporation_objectIncomeStatus, productReturnMoney on productReturnMoney.Id=platformServiceFee.ReturnMoneyId

select Id platformServiceFee_id, PlatformId platformServiceFee_platformId, SpvId platformServiceFee_spvId, ProductId platformServiceFee_productId, ReturnMoneyId platformServiceFee_returnMoneyId, SpvLoanId platformServiceFee_spvLoanId, TradeNumber platformServiceFee_tradeNumber, PayPlantformNumber platformServiceFee_payPlantformNumber, PrincipalAmount platformServiceFee_principalAmount, ServiceFee platformServiceFee_serviceFee, ServiceFeeRatio platformServiceFee_serviceFeeRatio, TakeTime platformServiceFee_takeTime, TakeStatus platformServiceFee_takeStatus, TakeFinishTime platformServiceFee_takeFinishTime, CheckingTime platformServiceFee_checkingTime, CheckingStatus platformServiceFee_checkingStatus, Remark platformServiceFee_remark from TC_PlatformServiceFee

select Id platformServiceFee_id, PlatformId platformServiceFee_platformId, SpvId platformServiceFee_spvId, ProductId platformServiceFee_productId, ReturnMoneyId platformServiceFee_returnMoneyId, SpvLoanId platformServiceFee_spvLoanId, TradeNumber platformServiceFee_tradeNumber, PayPlantformNumber platformServiceFee_payPlantformNumber, PrincipalAmount platformServiceFee_principalAmount, ServiceFee platformServiceFee_serviceFee, ServiceFeeRatio platformServiceFee_serviceFeeRatio, TakeTime platformServiceFee_takeTime, TakeStatus platformServiceFee_takeStatus, TakeFinishTime platformServiceFee_takeFinishTime, CheckingTime platformServiceFee_checkingTime, CheckingStatus platformServiceFee_checkingStatus, Remark platformServiceFee_remark from TC_PlatformServiceFee where Id=${id}

select Id platformServiceFee_id, PlatformId platformServiceFee_platformId, SpvId platformServiceFee_spvId, ProductId platformServiceFee_productId, ReturnMoneyId platformServiceFee_returnMoneyId, SpvLoanId platformServiceFee_spvLoanId, TradeNumber platformServiceFee_tradeNumber, PayPlantformNumber platformServiceFee_payPlantformNumber, PrincipalAmount platformServiceFee_principalAmount, ServiceFee platformServiceFee_serviceFee, ServiceFeeRatio platformServiceFee_serviceFeeRatio, TakeTime platformServiceFee_takeTime, TakeStatus platformServiceFee_takeStatus, TakeFinishTime platformServiceFee_takeFinishTime, CheckingTime platformServiceFee_checkingTime, CheckingStatus platformServiceFee_checkingStatus, Remark platformServiceFee_remark from TC_PlatformServiceFee order by Id asc limit ${start},${offset}
